dublin_core.dcvalue: This article provides a discussion regarding best education practices in the virtual environment The article begins with a brief definition of learning and overview of guiding principles that serve as the basis for best practices for learning with the benefit of technology This is followed by a discussion regarding learning with the benefit of technology instructional design principles for the online setting technology standards and best practices for learning with the benefit of technology
Journal for nurses in professional development
Best practices for learning with technology.
